full_summary:
# Office Seating Tender Announcement

## Summary

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office seating to the Department of Fisheries and Ocean Canada in Bridgewater, Nova Scotia.

## Details

* **Tender Reference Number**: WS4294539873
* **Opening Date**: January 31, 2024
* **Closing Date**: February 16, 2024, at 2:00 PM AST (Atlantic Standard Time)
* **Expected Start Date**: November 28, 2013
* **Delivery Location**: Bridgewater, Nova Scotia
* **Product Requirements**: Rotary chairs and stools
* **Suppliers Eligible**: Pre-qualified holders of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) Supply Arrangement (SA) #E60PQ-120001/H
* **Non-SA Holders Eligible**: Submit a bid to the Identifed User (IU) but must also submit an arrangement to the Supply Arrangement Authority (SAA) for evaluation

## Important Details

Supply Arrangement (SA) holders must submit a bid through the Government of Canada’s Electronic Tendering System. Non-SA holders must contact RCNAmeublement.NCRFurniture@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca to become a pre-qualified SA holder. Bidders must meet the requirements outlined in the Request for Proposal.

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact:
Kristelle LeBlanc, SPAC/PSPC
E-mail: [kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Note: This tender announcement is addressed in both English and French.
